Routine Descriptions

EVA_SITL_COM

 [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
COMMON BLOCK:  eva_sitl_com

   sg:        structure for handling graphic objects used in the dashboard
   fom_stack: array of pointers for handling stack history of D obtained by 
              get_data, 'mms_stlm_output_fom',data=D
   i_fom_stack: an interger for handling the point of stacking history.
   n_highlight: highlight counter

(See projects/mms/sitl/eva/source/cw_sitl/eva_sitl_com.pro)

EVA_SITL_COPY_FOMSTR

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 :NAME:
   eva_sitl_copy_fomstr

 :PURPOSE:
   To make a FOMstr tplot-varible for individuatl spacecraft.

 :INPUT:
   None, but "mms_stlm_fomstr" must exists.

EVA_SITL_LOAD_SOCS

 [Previous Routine] [Next Routine] [List of Routines] 
 NAME: 
   eva_sitl_load_socs

 PURPOSE: 
   To create FOMstr and/or BAKstr using Bob's Algorithm.
   This is basically a simulation of FOMstr generation
   at SDC.

(See projects/mms/sitl/eva/source/cw_sitl/eva_sitl_load_socs.pro)

EVA_SITL_LOAD_SOCS_GETFOM

 [Previous Routine] [List of Routines] 
 NAME:
   eva_sitl_load_socs_getfom

 PURPOSE:
   To 'forge' an FOMstr using MMS survey data.
 
 INPUT:
   tfom: a 2-element double array indicaing the time period of forging

(See projects/mms/sitl/eva/source/cw_sitl/eva_sitl_load_socs_getfom.pro)
